logos.location: Front of beanie, on the folded cuff, positioned towards the right side.
logos.description: Rectangular silicone patch featuring a raised, multi-color graphic of three red roses with green stems and leaves, rooted in white cloud-like elements. The entire patch appears to be a single molded silicone piece.

logoFingerprint.notes: The branding element is a standalone patch, manufactured entirely from silicone, with the graphic elements molded in 3D relief. This silicone patch is then presumably sewn onto the beanie, though the exact attachment method of the patch to the beanie is not clearly visible.
